policies.refund_policy: Customers can request a full refund within 14 days of purchase. After that, refunds are not available.
policies.cancellation_policy: Subscriptions can be canceled anytime, but will remain active until the end of the billing cycle.
policies.support_hours: Support is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM (UTC).

frequently_asked_questions.how_to_cancel: Log in to your account, go to 'Billing', and click 'Cancel Subscription'.
frequently_asked_questions.upgrade_plan: To upgrade, go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Upgrade Plan'.
frequently_asked_questions.discounts: We offer a 10% discount for annual subscriptions and a 15% discount for non-profits.

products.name: TaskMaster 3000
products.description: An AI-powered task management tool for teams.

products.description: A workflow automation tool with powerful integrations.
